Breadth-First.Explanation: Initial broad description of architectural style and gathering general clues without a specific hypothesis.

Depth-First.Explanation: Focusing on specific textual clues to form a hypothesis about a German-speaking location.
Cross-referencing search results to confirm the hypothesis with matching interior features.

Depth-First.Explanation: Verifying the precise address and confirming the district within Stuttgart.

Reviewing all findings again for absolute certainty.

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Moved from broad clue collection to focused analysis and hypothesis generation based on key textual features.
